name: Cuter Defenders
description:
************************************************* 

Sorry, I cannot figure out how to make this work on mobile or tablets, if anyone knows how to allow this over Unity WebGL please let me know. Anyways... 

**************************************************

Cuter Defenders! A simple strategy game. Hope you like it. 10 Levels. Each Level is a little longer and a little tougher.

**How To Play** At the bottom of the screen select a defender. Place the Defender on a square. Kill all the enemies before they reach the other side of the screen. Enemies will keep spawning while the timer at the top right is going.

Defenders

 ------------------------- 

Blue Apples (For Energy)

 Archers (Attack)

 Mage (Attack)

 Swordsman (Attack)

 Stone (Extra Defense)

Each Attacker has its own speed, attack, and other special properties.

Attackers ------------------ 

Skeleton 

Ghost

 Wolf

 Dark Mage 

Rock Boss

Thank You. Please Leave a Review and Follow me for more games and more.
